name: Number Block
description:
This game will test your calculation ability while training eye speed and hand speed, and has 4 different difficulty levels for you to challenge

Game features:

    ~ 4 different levels of difficulty

    ~ Exercise your calculation ability and reaction speed

    ~ Every difficulty will become harder with time

    ~ No need to network, you can play anytime after installation

    ~ Suitable for any age

Finally, have a nice day
